line.comment: * Mordan
* Then ask for the Position where we will drop it.
* Build it.
* Hector
* Consume the resources.
* say "Medium Orbital Weapons Platform"
* end Mordan
* Mordan9 - Upgrade to Regional Command Center
* Remove ALL cargo so none of it drops. May not be necessary.. Test first.
* Add-Ons 1.3: Hard difficulty cost slightly reduced (100 blue -> 90, 50 green -> 45)
* Insane mode cost: 4 outposts, 130 blue, 65 green
* Add-Ons 1.1: Terraforming must not be in progress to proceed.

line.text: 'Этот форпост и его груз будут уничтожены. Вы уверены?'

line.comment: * Save population number.
* Add-Ons 1.1: also saves laser, missile, and shield specialization.
* Save outpost Position
* "Command Accepted"
* Destroy old outpost - Make a good show of it.
* Create new Outpost at proper Position
* Because we are INSIDE the outpost management screen when we destroy the outpost, this global never gets reset, and means we can
* never bring up another outpost menu. So manually reset it here.
* Restore the Population
* Add-Ons 1.1: also saves laser, missile, and shield specialization. Shield is unused.
* System Check.
* Everything's Just fine. We'll start unloading here.

sval.val: Этот форпост и его груз будут уничтожены. Вы уверены?
При активном терраформировании, улучшения не возможны.
Then ask for the Position where we will drop it.
Mordan9 - Upgrade to Regional Command Center
Remove ALL cargo so none of it drops. May not be necessary.. Test first.
Add-Ons 1.3: Hard difficulty cost slightly reduced (100 blue -> 90, 50 green -> 45)
Insane mode cost: 4 outposts, 130 blue, 65 green
Add-Ons 1.1: Terraforming must not be in progress to proceed.
Add-Ons 1.1: also saves laser, missile, and shield specialization.
Destroy old outpost - Make a good show of it.
Create new Outpost at proper Position
Because we are INSIDE the outpost management screen when we destroy the outpost, this global never gets reset, and means we can
never bring up another outpost menu. So manually reset it here.
Add-Ons 1.1: also saves laser, missile, and shield specialization. Shield is unused.
Everything's Just fine. We'll start unloading here.
